content: The standard size of the Go board is 19x19. Other board sizes such as 13x13 or 9x9 are also used, usually by beginners or players who desire shorter games.
translations: ita:La dimensione standard del tavolo di Go Ã¨ 19x19. Vengono utilizzate anche altre dimensioni del tavolo come 13x13 o 9x9,
